name: binolingo
description:
This game is contribution of our team into Bratislava GameJam 2021 compo.

Hello I am ... Do you understand me? Who.. What are you? First thing we try is to... speak. Meaningfull communication is common for all inteligent beings In our game communication and understanding is your goal. Will YOU understand?

Team members:

  • JaNee
  • RandomR
  • MikeSelf
  • mOOnSPa
